name: Election Denial Funding
description: Donations to candidates who objected to 2020 election certification

name: Major Trump PAC Donations
description: Significant donations to Trump campaigns or affiliated PACs

name: GOP Political Donations
description: General Republican Party or candidate donations

name: Post-Jan 6 Funding
description: Continued donations to election objectors after January 6

name: Surveillance Technology
description: Technology or services enabling government surveillance

name: Anti-LGBTQ Funding
description: Donations to anti-LGBTQ organizations or causes

name: DEI Program Elimination
description: Public rollback or elimination of diversity programs

name: Anti-Reproductive Rights
description: Funding or advocacy against reproductive healthcare access

name: Labor Law Violations
description: Documented violations of labor law or worker protections

name: Wage Theft
description: Documented wage theft or compensation violations

name: Anti-Regulatory Lobbying
description: Heavy lobbying against consumer or worker protections
